title: Welcome to Outline
text: Outline is an open source knowledge base and wiki for teams. Use this article to get started with the basics.

title: Creating Your First Document
text: To create your first document, click the 'New Document' button on the sidebar. Add your content and save.

title: Using Keyboard Shortcuts
text: Outline supports many keyboard shortcuts to speed up your workflow. For example, press Ctrl+K to search quickly.

title: Organizing Collections
text: Use collections to organize related documents. You can create, rename, or delete collections easily.

title: API Authentication
text: Outline uses Bearer tokens for API authentication. Include your API token in the Authorization header for secure access.
